EmailTemplate.description: Email Alert to All Customer Portal Enabled Users for My Portfolio with pop-up Settings in Browsers
EmailTemplate.name: pop-up Enabling For My Portfolio
EmailTemplate.subject: Solution For Problems of My Portfolio Browser Settings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
Trust you are doing well.
The site www.ffreedom.in allow you to get logged in to Ffreedom customer portal. Once you login to your account and when you click 'My Portfolio' tab you can face some problems related to browser, such as it doesn't allow pop-ups. To get resolved from such kind of problems, please find attachments and follow Instructions of Related Browsers.
Thank You, Ffreedom Team.
